rtaxref 0.1.0
  • Reference

Retrieve a taxon information using its id

Source: R/rt_taxa_id.R
rt_taxa_id.Rd

Retrieve a taxon information using its id

rt_taxa_id(id)

Arguments

id

integer(1)
an integer giving the id of the taxon in TaxRef (also called cdNom)

Examples

rt_taxa_id(id = 443800)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 45
#>       id referenceId parentId scientificName authority fullName fullNameHtml
#>    <int>       <int>    <int> <fct>          <fct>     <fct>    <fct>       
#> 1 443800      443800   443585 Bradypus trid… Linnaeus… Bradypu… <i>Bradypus…
#> # … with 38 more variables: rankId <fct>, rankName <fct>, referenceName <fct>,
#> #   referenceNameHtml <fct>, frenchVernacularName <fct>,
#> #   englishVernacularName <lgl>, genusName <fct>, familyName <fct>,
#> #   orderName <fct>, className <fct>, phylumName <fct>, kingdomName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularGenusName <lgl>, vernacularFamilyName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularOrderName <lgl>, vernacularClassName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularPhylumName <fct>, vernacularKingdomName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularGroup1 <fct>, vernacularGroup2 <fct>, habitat <fct>, fr <lgl>,
#> #   gf <fct>, mar <lgl>, gua <lgl>, sm <lgl>, sb <lgl>, spm <lgl>, may <lgl>,
#> #   epa <lgl>, reu <lgl>, sa <lgl>, ta <lgl>, nc <lgl>, wf <lgl>, pf <lgl>,
#> #   cli <lgl>, taxrefVersion <fct>
rt_taxa_id(id = 110335)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 45
#>       id referenceId parentId scientificName authority fullName fullNameHtml
#>    <int>       <int>    <int> <fct>          <fct>     <fct>    <fct>       
#> 1 110335      110335   195496 Ophrys apifera Huds., 1… Ophrys … <i>Ophrys a…
#> # … with 38 more variables: rankId <fct>, rankName <fct>, referenceName <fct>,
#> #   referenceNameHtml <fct>, frenchVernacularName <fct>,
#> #   englishVernacularName <fct>, genusName <fct>, familyName <fct>,
#> #   orderName <fct>, className <fct>, phylumName <lgl>, kingdomName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularGenusName <lgl>, vernacularFamilyName <lgl>,
#> #   vernacularOrderName <lgl>, vernacularClassName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularPhylumName <lgl>, vernacularKingdomName <fct>,
#> #   vernacularGroup1 <fct>, vernacularGroup2 <fct>, habitat <fct>, fr <fct>,
#> #   gf <lgl>, mar <lgl>, gua <lgl>, sm <lgl>, sb <lgl>, spm <lgl>, may <lgl>,
#> #   epa <lgl>, reu <lgl>, sa <lgl>, ta <lgl>, nc <lgl>, wf <lgl>, pf <lgl>,
#> #   cli <lgl>, taxrefVersion <fct>
